content: naughty or nice instructions cast on 44 stitches with white yarn place a marker slipping as you come to it begin working in the round materials round 1 purl all stitches round 2 knit all stitches yarn 3 skeins of cascade pacific bulky 129 rounds 3 5 7 9 purl all stitches yards/200 grams each rounds 4 6 8 10 knit all stitches colors used 1 ball each 02 white 33 cactus 43 ruby rounds 11 - 31 change to main color yarn and knit all stitches needle us 13 16 circular and dpns crown decreases notions 1 stitch marker darning needle round 32 *k9 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 40 sts gauge and size rounds 33 - 35 knit all stitches round 36 *k8 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 36 sts 10 sts x 14 row = 4 round 37-39 knit all stitches average adult size round 40 *k7 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 32 sts 3 skeins of this yarn make 3 hats as shown with rounds 41-42 knit all stitches pom poms round 43 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 28 sts abbreviations round 44-45 knit all stitches round 46 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 24 sts k= knit round 47 knit all stitches k2tog = knit 2 stitches together round 48 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 20 sts notes round 49 knit all stitches striped hat alternates colors each round round 50 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 16 sts round 51 knit all stitches round 52 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 12 sts round 53 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 8 sts rounds 54-56 knit all stitches cut yarn leaving a long tail thread the tail through a darning needle and pull through the remaining stitches weave in ends and block after you ve knit the 3 hats add a pom-pom with the remaining yarn darnknitanyway com stillwater mn 651-342-1386 ©2024 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern we hope you make beautiful knit items for yourself or your loved ones
